cause.description:
This is a support group for those who have loved ones who have or have had an eating disorder, those who have or had and eating disorder, those who have lost someone to an eating disorder, those who simply need the help and support of others who have dealt with Eating Disorders or have had one, and anything and everything to do with Eating Disorders. If you have any questions--you can also politely ask them. Control is usually a big part of Eating Disorders--many of those who suffer have a hard time dealing with pain, trauma, stress, and life in general. Others may simply just not like who they are, and try to alter their appearance, and not deal with the real problem...Then there are also many who innocently begin a diet--that builds & overpowers your thoughts to where you lose touch with yourself. It's not your fault---you aren't alone. Stay Strong...
1. Eating Disorders are serious and deadly diseases. Learn and try to Understand.
2. Many young women and men suffer from either anorexia/or bulimia--Support.
3. Eating Disorders aren't a choice...they are a disease that works yourself against yourself and loved ones. Try to get help.
cause.mission: help people to better understand, support and learn more about the disease.
cause.name: Eating Disorder Awareness*
